Title: Relates to use of monies from the community health care revolving capital fund
Summary: Permits the use of monies from the community health care revolving capital fund to enable participating borrowers to operate a financially and operationally sustainable practice.
LawCode: Amd ยง2815-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the use of monies from the community health care revolving capital fund
